title: All That He Requires
description: After an emotional fight and the Morning From Hell, Lily and Connor are reunited and on their way to Las Vegas.With luxurious surroundings and mind-blowing sex on the menu, everything seems to be coming up roses. But Connor has a secret agenda in Vegas, something he hasn't told even his closest confidants.And no one is prepared when shadowy figures from Connor's past reappear, threatening to destroy his plans - and Lily's fragile chance at happiness.45,000 words. Contains explicit sensual scenes and profanity. For mature audiences only.
author: Olivia Thorne
